description: Generators are the life force of the planet, designed to respond to life and find satisfaction through work.

protocol.decision_making: Wait to respond to external cues before initiating
protocol.energy_management: Sustainable work capacity when following correct response

optimal_approach.work: Engage in work that lights you up and generates satisfaction
optimal_approach.relationships: Respond to invitations rather than pursuing
optimal_approach.decisions: Trust gut response - yes/no feeling in the sacral

stress_mapping.recovery_protocol: Rest and wait for new responses to emerge
